name: Optimus Crux Lite
description:
The Optimus Crux Lite is equipped with the powerful burner of the Crux, but even lighter in weight as it does not have a folding mechanism. Includes burner with valve and stuff bag. Ignition: Manual, Size: 3" x 2.2" x 2.2", Output: 10,200 BTU. 
Boil time: 3 min (1 liter)
Weight: 2.54 oz.

name: Optimus CRUX LITE W/TERRA SOLO Cookset
description:
The smallest, most ultra light 3-piece cook system combines the Crux Lite stove and Solo Cookset. Set includes: Crux Lite stove, 0.6 L hard anodized aluminum saucepan with pouring lip and measuring marks (mL and oz), fry pan that doubles as a lid, mesh storage bag and nylon storage bag to store Crux Lite stove. Ignition: Manual, Size: 3" x 2.2" x 2.2" (stove only), 4.2" x 5.4" (cookset), Output: 10,200 BTU. 
Boil time: 3 min (1 liter)
Weight: 2.54 oz. (stove only), 9.5 oz. (cookset)

name: Spork
description: Our spoon-fork-knife combo brings a bit of civilization to the wild and a bit of the wild to civilization. Designed especially for Light My Fire by Scandinavian designer Joachim Nordwall. The Spork is perfect for your backpack, boat, picnic basket, lunchbox, purse or briefcase.

name: Plastic Pails
description: Our food grade buckets are perfect for bulk foods such as; Wheat, Sugar, Flour, Cereals and much more.  We offer colored pails and lids so things can be color coded.  All pails are FDA approved except black.

name: Gamma Seal Lid
description: The Gamma lid is a great option for items that are used often or circulated.  It converts any 4 ,5 or 6 gallon pail into a reusable and resealable container.  Come in a variety of colors and are FDA approved.

name: Bung Wrench/Bucket Lid Lifter
description: Highly suggested item.  If you don't use screw off gamma lids you will need this to help you remove the lids from your buckets without breaking up fingers.  Also will remove the bung plugs off of your water barrels.

name: The Outdoor Trail BREAKFAST
description: The Outdoor Trail is unique in our packaging, all of our adventure packs have 2 individual servings in one lightweight pouch. Whether you are on the go or in the comfort of your RV, The Outdoor Trail adventure food will tantalize your taste buds. Why compromise taste when you can have The Outdoor Trail. Quality you can count on, perfect every time.  Must ship in cases of 6.

name: The Outdoor Trail INSTANT ENTREE
description: These meals differ from the entrees in that they can be prepared without simmering.  Just add water.   Outdoor Trail is unique in our packaging, all of our adventure packs have 2 individual servings in one lightweight pouch. Whether you are on the go or in the comfort of your RV, The Outdoor Trail adventure food will tantalize your taste buds. Why compromise taste when you can have The Outdoor Trail. Quality you can count on, perfect every time.  These must be shipped in cases of 6 meal packs.

name: The Outdoor Trail ENTREE
description: The Outdoor Trail is unique in our packaging, all of our adventure packs have 2 individual servings in one lightweight pouch. Whether you are on the go or in the comfort of your RV, The Outdoor Trail adventure food will tantalize your taste buds. Why compromise taste when you can have The Outdoor Trail. Quality you can count on, perfect every time.  Must ship in orders of 6.

name: The Outdoor Trail DRINKS
description: The Outdoor Trail is unique in our packaging. Whether you are on the go or in the comfort of your RV, The Outdoor Trail adventure food will tantalize your taste buds. name: The Outdoor Trail DESERTS
description: The Outdoor Trail is unique in our packaging, all of our adventure packs have 2 individual servings in one lightweight pouch. Whether you are on the go or in the comfort of your RV, The Outdoor Trail adventure food will tantalize your taste buds. Why compromise taste when you can have The Outdoor Trail. Quality you can count on, perfect every time. Must ship in cases of 6.

name: Grizzly Ridge Apple Slices
description: A natural delight, Dehydrated Apple Slices are 100% fruit and perfect snacks for outdoor doings. They are energy boosting favorites. Or rehydrate them for a cereal or dessert topping. Take them along in your next adventure as a natural reward.  6 Serving Size.  Sealed bags will stay fresh for over five years.  For the sake of shipping these foods are shipped in boxes of six, unless ordered with another product so as to combine shipping.

name: Grizzly Ridge Honey Coated Banana Slices
description: An exceptional snack, Honey Coated Banana Slices are sweet and delicious. Additive free, they satisfy your between meal nosh in a healthful way. Or use them for a cereal topping. They’re ideal for lifting spirits and providing added energy as you move through your day.  6 Serving Size.  Sealed bags will stay fresh for over five years.  For the sake of shipping these foods are shipped in boxes of six, unless ordered with another product so as to combine shipping.

name: Grizzly Ridge Orange Delight Drink Mix
description: An ideal pick-me-up, Orange Delight Drink Mix is a superbly refreshing, tangy thirst-quencher and a great source of vitamin C, perfect for slaking that big outdoor thirst. Just add water. You’ll love it as much as the fresh air you breathe.  24 Serving Size.  Sealed bags will stay fresh for over five years.  For the sake of shipping these foods are shipped in boxes of six, unless ordered with another product so as to combine shipping.

name: Grizzly Ridge Hot Chocolate Mix
description: A superb choice, Milk Chocolate Hot Cocoa Mix is a wonderfully smooth, rich and creamy drink. Just add water. It makes for the perfect warm-up on a chilly outdoors morning and an ideal, cool refreshment to go with meals—whether you’re out on the trail or back at camp. 16 Serving Size.  Sealed bags will stay fresh for over five years.  For the sake of shipping these foods are shipped in boxes of six, unless ordered with another product so as to combine shipping.

name: Grizzly Ridge Super Nutty Granola
description: An unpretentious treat, Super Nutty Granola has just the right amount of yummy sweetness and chewy crunchiness for either a breakfast meal or an out-on-the-trail snack. Don’t go into the wild without it. 6 Serving Size.    Sealed bags will stay fresh for over five years.  For the sake of shipping these foods are shipped in boxes of six, unless ordered with another product so as to combine shipping.

name: Grizzly Ridge Scrambled Eggs with Bacon
description: A downhome pick, Scrambled Eggs with Bacon Flavored Bits makes a palate-pleasing breakfast meal preferred by outdoor people everywhere. Just add hot water and cook. Half the fun of camping is eating outdoors. And these are the perfect complement to outdoor fun . .  even when it’s indoors. 12 Serving Size.    Sealed bags will stay fresh for over five years.  For the sake of shipping these foods are shipped in boxes of six, unless ordered with another product so as to combine shipping.

name: Grizzly Ridge Maple Brown Sugar Oatmeal
description: An earthy preference, Maple Brown Sugar Oatmeal is hearty, healthful and satisfying, with just the right amount of brown sugar and maple flavor for that out-of-doors goodness. Just add hot water. Easy to carry in a backpack, it makes a perfect meal on the trail or on the road, as well as at home.  6 Serving Size.  Sealed bags will stay fresh for over five years.   For the sake of shipping these foods are shipped in boxes of six, unless ordered with another product so as to combine shipping.

name: Grizzly Ridge Buttermilk Pancake Mix
description: An ever popular favorite, Buttermilk Pancake Mix is full of wholesome goodness and irresistible flavor. Just add water and cook. Hot off the grill, they are a taste-tempting delight and a camping staple. They make any breakfast memorable and exceptional! 8Serving Size.  Sealed bags will stay fresh for over five years.  For the sake of shipping these foods are shipped in boxes of six, unless ordered with another product so as to combine shipping.

name: Grizzly Ridge Creamy Potato Soup
description: A favored natural, Creamy Potato Soup Mix is a satisfying, savory soup to gratify that hunger you feel after a full day’s activities. Creamy and delicious, the rich potato flavor is incomparable, especially in a natural setting. Just add hot water and cook. It’s an adventure all its own. 8 Serving Size.  Sealed bags will stay fresh for over five years.  For the sake of shipping these foods are shipped in boxes of six, unless ordered with another product so as to combine shipping.

name: Grizzly Ridge Pasta Alfredo
description: A preferred selection, Pasta Alfredo is pasta noodles in a sumptuous sauce. Just add water and cook. It makes a perfect outdoor meal when you’re anxious to get back to what you love doing. You’re in your environment, out there doing what you love. And this is the perfect partner. 4 Serving Size.  Sealed bags will stay fresh for over five years.  For the sake of shipping these foods are shipped in boxes of six, unless ordered with another product so as to combine shipping.

name: Grizzly Ridge Stoganoff
description: A premium choice, Stroganoff is pasta noodles in a delightful sauce. It’s a dish with that elegant, distinctive taste that nature lovers everywhere enjoy. Just add water and cook. It’s rich and satisfying, just like the action and adventure you seek. 5 Serving Size.  Sealed bags will stay fresh for over five years.  For the sake of shipping these foods are shipped in boxes of six, unless ordered with another product so as to combine shipping.

name: Wolvermouse 1 day Plus Bug out bag
description:
This bag is mean like a wolverine but small and compact.  One may have a great emergency storage at home but we spend much of our time away at work or on errands.  We have created this bag to be very useful but small enough to keep in your vehicle or a closet at work.  It will help get you back to your loved ones and larger emergency stash.  This kit contains; 
8 servings of Grizzly Ridge soup, 
Geber 32 oz Bear Grylls canteen and aluminum cook cup, 
spork, 
water tablets, 
head lamp, 
rain poncho, 
stormproof matches, 
Mora knife and fire steel combo, 
emergency whistle, 
blanket, 
hand warmers, 
signal mirror, 
bandanna, 
insect repellant, 
toilet paper, 
50 ft 550 cord, 
3m dust mask and first aid kit.  
There is still space to add personal items and the bag also has a pocket meant to conceal a handgun.  This little bag weighs 8.5 pounds including water weight.  You will save $22.00 over assembling this kit yourself, even at our prices.

name: Elite 3 day plus Bug out bag
description:
We have taken great care to create a bug out bag that is light, compact, and useful.  Many kits are like a scuba tank and when it is empty then so is your life support.  We like to think of this bag more as a life line that is good for 3 days PLUS, it can sustain life for more than 3 days with a little skill.  For the tools are here.  This kit is easy to use contains high quality items such as 
Dehydrated food,
2-48oz Nalgene water silos, 
water purifying tablets, 
storm proof matches, 
mini lantern/flashlight combo, 
emergency sleeping bag, 
hand warmers, 
first aid kit, 
Mora brand knife with fire striker built in, 
Emberlit stove, 
32 oz cook pot and lid, 
spork, 
100 feet of 550 cord, 
emergency whistle, 
signal mirror, 
insect spray, 
chapstick, 
bandana, 
toilet paper, 
poncho, 
heavy duty garbage can liner, 
3m dust mask 
with room to add more personal items. 
Our kit also contains a straight forward survival book written by Mykel Hawke to aid in keeping you and your loved ones safe.  
This bag weighs in at 18 lbs including water weight.  You will save $33 over trying to assemble this kit one piece at a time, even at our prices.  This bag is meant for one person but we do offer an extra person upgrade kit, as well as a comfort kit.

name: Longitude Survival Kit
description:
While Mykel Hawke utilizes and teaches survival skills using elements of the surrounding environment, he also advocates being as prepared as possible. These kits weigh less than half a pound and can easily be tucked into a vehicle or a backpack, attached to a belt or carried on the wrist.

 • Iodine Prep Pads
• Alcohol Prep Pads
• High Decibel Whistle
• Ultra Bright Flashlight
• Signaling Mirror
• Snare Wire
• Multi Function Knife
• Matches
• Compass
• Emergency Blanket
• Wire Saw
• Waterproof Pouch

name: Latitude Survival Kit
description:
While Mykel Hawke utilizes and teaches survival skills using elements of the surrounding environment, he also advocates being as prepared as possible. These kits weigh less than half a pound and can easily be tucked into a vehicle or a backpack, attached to a belt or carried on the wrist. 

	
• Iodine Prep Pads
• Alcohol Prep Pads
• Sewing Kit
• Ultra Bright Flashlight
• Signaling Mirror
• Snare Wire
• Multi Function Plier
• Full Fishing Kit
• Compass
• Fire Striker
• Waterproof	Poncho
• Waterproof Pouch

name: Comfort Package
description: There are 101 ways to set up a diamond fly.  Ok not literally but there are a lot of ways.  Our 10'X10' diamond fly is made of 30 denier ripstop fabric and weighs only 12oz.  The sleeping pad is our Klymit Static V and 4 more hand warmers are include in this set.  This fits in nicely with our Elite 3 Day Plus bail out bag.  It will turn survival into a bit more comfortable experience.  Also, this is a great, light weight solution for those outdoors people that desire quality, minimal weight and the bargain price of this package deal.  Of course all of this items may be purchase individually.

name: The Outdoor Trail SCOUT 72-HOUR MEAL KIT
description:
Being prepared is something we see more and more everyday. In the past food storage had been less than palatable and or time consuming. Preparation has been difficult to grind mix and prepare your meals. The Outdoor Trail has made our meals easy, affordable, and great tasting. The extended shelf life of all of our kits ensure taste and quality for many years to come. The Outdoor Trail kits are packaged in an air tight, water proof, durable, and tamper resistant pail that is compact and stackable.  The advantage to this kit is that all the meals can be prepared easily with boiling water, no simmering is required.  The kit contains:

1-Alfredo

1-Mac and Cheese

1-Lasagna

1-Spaghetti

1-Fried Rice

1-Red Beans & Rice

2-Oatmeal

1-Granola & Milk

Bonus Items

1-Pudding

2-Orange Drink

2-Milk

name: Augason Farms 12 Day Pail (4 people 72hrs)
description:
12-Days of delicious easy-to-prepare food for one person plus a plastic self-filtering, pull-top, water bottle, fire starter and menu guides, all packed in a "grab & go" pail.

Sealed in the pail, food items have a shelf life up to 20 years, and come in easy to use pouches. The whole pail weighs approximately 15 lbs and is easy to transport if necessary. Kit includes a self-filtration water bottle that reduces specific health-related contaminants, such as Cryptosporidium, Giardia, lead, volatile organic chemicals and improves water taste. Also included is a FireOn disk that is easy to light in the worst of conditions. The included meal planning guide offers a wide range of appetizing combinations, making it easy to mix and match meals, and ensures that you get 2,000 calories per day.

Food Items Include:
• Cheesy Broccoli with Rice (18 servings)
• Vegetable Stew Blend (24 servings)
• Creamy Potato Soup (18 servings)
• Maple Brown Sugar Oatmeal (20 servings)
• Instant White Rice (27 servings)
• Vegetarian Meat Substitute Beef (flavored) (18 servings)
• Morning Moo's Milk Alternative (60 servings)
• Hearty Vegetable Chicken Soup (18 servings)


Specifications
• Food for 1 Person for 12 days
• Average of 2063 calories per day
• Shelf life of up to 20 years unopened* -- Pouch shelf life of up to one year after opening pail
• Food packaged in sealed pouches with oxygen absorbers or nitrogen flushed
• 203 servings
• No hydrogenated oils or trans fats
• Reusable 4 gallon-sized pail with handle--made in USA
• Each pouch clearly marked with date of manufacture
• 12-Day Meal Planning Guide (suggestions for mixing and matching food components)
• Bonus: 24-Day Meal Planning Guide with extended meals per day
• Self-filtering 22 ounce water bottle
• FireOn fire starter disk:
     Lights in as little as a 1/2 a second
     Water resistant
     Burns in winds of up to 30 MPH
     Perfect for cooking during a power outage
     Burns for up to 30 minutes
     Safe to store in your home or garage
• Food, pail, FireOn and water bottle proudly manufactured in the USA
• Easy to transport with a net weight of 13 pounds 8.93 oz (6.14 kg) (excluding water bottle)

*Best when stored in a cool, dry place at temperatures between 50°F and 70°F (ideal humidity 15%)

name: THE OUTFITTER 60 INSTANT MEAL KIT
description:
In the past outfitters have had to buy individual pouches that are expensive and bulky. The Outfitter Kit contains 60 instant individual meals that are easily transported in one container. Buying in bulk allows the outfitter affordability and a variety of meals to offer clients and guests. We recommend using cook liners for easy preparation of meals.


10-Mac & Cheese

10-Spaghetti

10-Alfredo

10-Stoganoff

10-Lasagna

10-Teriyaki

Just add boiling water in a container of choice, cover, stir and let stand for 7-10 minutes… Enjoy!

name: RANGER 60 MEAL KIT
description:
This Outdoor Trails kit will support four people for five days.  Great for a family grab and go food supply.  In the past food storage had been less than palatable and or time consuming. Preparation has been difficult to grind mix and prepare your meals. The Outdoor Trail has made our meals easy, affordable, and great tasting. The extended shelf life of all of our kits ensure taste and quality for many years to come. The Outdoor Trail kits are packaged in an air tight, water proof, durable, and tamper resistant pail that is compact and stackable.This kit contains:

6- Broccoli Cheese

6- Mac & Cheese

9- Fried Rice

9-Chili

12-Stew

6-Alfredo

6-Stroganoff

6-Teriyaki

name: Augason Farms One Month Pack
description:
The One Month Pack contains plenty of food for one person to last 30 days! There is an endless number of meal options you can make by combining products in the pack; it's a great way to have a variety of meals readily available. The pack contains over 540 servings and provides a 2,073 calorie diet per day for an entire month for one person! All cans have easy pop-open tops, so no need to store a can opener with this item. Up to a 30 year shelf life.

Augason Farms One Month Pack includes a Recipe Booklet and 48 Everyday Size Cans of the following:

  2     Orange Delight Drink Mix
  1     Dried Whole Eggs
  2     Chocolate Morning Moo's Milk Alternative
  4     Honey Coated Banana Slices
  1     Freeze Dried Sliced Strawberries

  1     Vegetarian Meat Substitute Beef (flavored)
  1     Vegetarian Meat Substitute Bacon Bits (flavored)
  1     Vegetarian Meat Substitute Chicken (flavored)
  2     Cheesy Broccoli Soup Mix
  3     Creamy Potato Soup Mix
  3     Chicken Noodle Soup Mix
  3     Southwest Chili Mix
  6     Creamy Wheat Cereal
  3     Buttermilk Pancake Mix

Makes a great gift because of its convenient packaging and is perfect for food storage!

Approximate Water Amount to Rehydrate all Pack Products: Almost 23 gallons
Approximate Dimensions: H-20" W-17" L-13"
Approximate Gross Weight: 40 lbs

description:
Augason Farms 3-Month 2-Person Kit is the perfect kit to get started with your food storage. The kit contains all your basic food nutrition for two people for three months at approximately 1,440 calories per day per person. It contains 2,747 total servings.  This kit has a 30 year shelf life.

description:
Augason Farms Deluxe One Year Food Storage Kit includes 53 more cans than the Premium One Year Kit.  A greater variety of everyday foods, including soups and baking mixes, have been added to the deluxe kit.  This selection provides the ability to create “regular” meals, not just subsistence food, averaging almost 2,000 calories per day.  The kit contains over 8,540 servings. It also includes a can of Vegetable Garden Seeds that is capable of producing over 2300 pounds of fresh vegetables.  This kit has a 30 year shelf life.

name: Augason Farms 4 Person 1 Year Deluxe
description:
The Augason Farms Deluxe 4-Person One Year Food Storage Kit contains a delicious selection of our best selling products ensuring great variety and positive nutrition. The average calories per day is approximately 1,300. There are 21,116 total servings in the kit. Each person per day for a year would be getting approximately 14 servings.  This kit has a 30 shelf life.

The Kit contains 360 #10 Cans:
30 Hard White Wheat (51 servings per can)
8 Creamy Wheat Cereal (36 servings per can)
60 Long Grain White Rice (47 servings per can)
4 Elbow Macaroni (26 servings per can)
60 Quick Rolled Oats (22 servings per can)
4 Creamy Potato Soup Mix (33 servings per can)
4 Vegetable Stew Blend (40 servings per can)
1 Beef Gravy (38 servings per can)
6 Dehydrated Potato Flakes (30 servings per can)
4 Dehydrated Potato Shreds (21 servings per can)
2 Dehydrated Potato Slices (28 servings per can)
1 Honey Powder (340 servings per can)
2 Honey Wheat Bread & Roll Mix (49 servings per can)
4 Honey White Bread & Roll Mix (49 servings per can)
1 Buttermilk Biscuit Mix (no leavening) (31 servings per can)
2 Hearty Vegetable Beef Soup Mix (21 servings per can)
2 Hearty Vegetable Chicken Soup Mix (21 servings per can)
1 Iodized Salt (1474 servings per can)
1 Shortening Powder (178 servings per can)
2 Chocolate Fudge Brownie Mix (45 servings per can)
2 Blueberry Muffin Mix (40 servings per can)
7 Six Grain Pancake Mix (21 servings per can)
1 Brown Sugar (529 servings per can)
2 White Granulated Sugar (595 servings per can)
4 Dehydrated Potato Dices (20 servings per can)
5 Freeze Dried Sweet Corn (23 servings per can)
1 Dehydrated Chopped Onions (217 servings per can)
2 Freeze Dried Broccoli Florets & Stems (28 servings per can)
4 Dehydrated Diced Carrots (29 servings per can)
3 Dehydrated Cross Cut Celery (36 servings per can)
1 Dehydrated Sliced Mushrooms (36 servings per can)
1 Dehydrated Diced Red & Green Bell Peppers (113 servings per can)
18 Honey Coated Banana Slices (21 servings per can)
5 Freeze Dried Sliced Strawberries (18 servings per can)
3 Freeze Dried Whole Raspberries (22 servings per can)
4 Dehydrated Apple Slices (32 servings per can)
8 Country Fresh 100% Real Instant Nonfat Dry Milk (39 servings per can)
18 Morning Moo's® Low Fat Milk Alternative (93 servings per can)
4 Chocolate Morning Moo's® Low Fat Milk Alternative (57 servings per can)
1 Cheese Blend Powder (43 servings per can)
1 Butter Powder (204 servings per can)
8 Dried Whole Eggs (71 servings per can)
10 Beef Flavored Vegetarian Meat Substitute (40 servings per can)
10 Bacon Flavored Bits Vegetarian Meat Substitute (192 servings per can)
8 Chicken Flavored Vegetarian Meat Substitute (41 servings per can)
3 Taco Flavored Vegetarian Meat Substitute (30 servings per can)
2 Pinto Beans (52 servings per can)
2 Lentils (48 servings per can)
2 Baby Lima Beans (44 servings per can)
2 Black Turtle Beans (49 servings per can)
2 Dark Red Kidney Beans (50 servings per can)
1 Chicken Bouillon (921 servings per can)
3 Apple Delight Drink Mix (103 servings per can)
3 Orange Delight Drink Mix (99 servings per can)
4 Enriched Bleached All Purpose Flour (92 servings per can)
2 Potato Gems (45 servings per can)
2 Buttermilk Pancake Mix (21 servings per can)
2 Dried Scrambled Egg Mix (92 servings per can)

DUE TO THE SIZE OF THIS SHIPMENT, PLEASE CALL TO ARRANGE SHIPPING COSTS.  PLEASE ALLOW UP TO 30 DAYS PROCESSING TIME.

name: Emberlit Stove
description: This is a really great back packing or survival stove, and is included in our Elite 3 day plus pack.  It weighs less than 11.3 oz (316 g). Packs flat. Assembles in seconds. Lifetime guarantee. Stainless Crossbar Adapters included. Made in the USA.

name: Klymit 20 Degree Down Sleeping bag
description:
The newest addition to Klymit's camping line. A 20 degree down sleeping bag that is compact, comfortable, and is a great complement to any of the Inertia or Static camping pads.  

Color: Black
20 Degree 550 Down Sleeping Bag
2.59 lbs / 1175 g
84.5" x 31.5" x 21.7"
Lightweight breathable fabrics
Neck collar to minimize heat loss
Includes large mesh storage sack

name: Titanium Goat Vertex Tent
description:
The Vertex is made right here in Utah.   There are 4 different sizes, and are quite light weight, practical and a breeze to set up.   They are build with 30 denier ripstop nylon.  
The Vertex 8 is 200 square feet, weighs 6  lbs with all of the pegs and pole measuring 17.75' by 15' and 8' tall and sleeps 4 with gear comfortably.
The Vertex 7.5 is 4lbs 12oz with 133 sq feet measuring 13' by 12.5' and 7.6' tall.  This sleeps 3 with gear comfortably.
The Vertex 6.5 weighs 4lb 2 oz with 102 sq feet, measuring 12' by 11' and 6.5' tall.  This sleeps 3 with gear.
The smallest being the Vertex 5 weighs just 24oz and is 54 sq feet 9.75' by 8.5' and 5' tall. This sleeps 2 with gear.  
We stock all sizes but the Vertex 5 which is made to order.  Also, all but the Vertex 5 can be used with one of our titanium stoves used for heat and cooking.  The tents and stove both are amazing and durable.

name: Lone Tree 30d Diamond Fly
description: Our Lone Tree Diamond Fly is made of 30 denier ripstop silicon impregnated nylon.  It measures 10'X10' and can be set up 100 different ways.  Ok not really 100 but there are lots of ways to use a diamond fly.  It can be used as a ground tarp, wrap around you tarp, a cover stuff up tarp, a shelter in many different configurations, it can be used to collect water or to keep the wind and rain off just wrapped around your shoulders.  It really is a valuable piece of equipment.  This fly can also be purchased in our "Comfort Pack" for additional savings.  The sleeping pad and hand warmers shown are sold separately.

name: Titanium Stove
description: These stoves are incredible!  They are meant not only to heat our Vertex tents but can be used with our Lone Tree 30d Fly and for cooking as well.  They weigh only 1lb 10oz and they collapse down to be very compact.(photo shows the one on the left assembled, and the one on the right is disassembled)  They are available in 2 sizes the 12" and 22" differing in length not width.

name: Klymit Double Diamond Vest
description:
The Klymit Kinetic Double Diamond vest has been designed with the utmost attention to detail. It is constructed using high-tech welding prodcesses to create the Nobletek gas chambers which are optimize warmth and comfort. With a 4-way stretch fabric with both a durable and soft hand it idea for any use. The only garment around that let's you control the amount of insulation you have at the turn of a dial. 

Every vest comes with the Dry Air Pump for endless inflating and deflating for ultimate adjustability for any temperature and condition. Purchase the Argon Starter Kit for increased warmth and performance.

name: Klymit Inertia X Frame
description: Awesome sleeping pad!  It is light weight just 9.1oz, rolls down to the size of a soda can and is quite comfortable.  It can be blown up in 3 breaths and has a small pump to fine tune the pressure.  Also the voids in the pad allow for more loft in the insulation of your sleeping bag to make your night a warmer one.

name: Klymit Static V
description:
In our opinion this is the best all around pad on the market.  The Klymit Static V is a lightweight camping pad using body mapping technology at an entry level price. It features the v-chamber design which limits air movement and heat loss while offering a uniquely ergonomic body map which is optimzed for performance and comfort. While inflating in approximately 10-15 breaths it will save you time and energy wherever you are.

Like all of the other Klymit camping pads it features an easy-to-use push valve allows for quick inflation and deflation.

name: SOL Emergency 1 Person Blanket
description:
The most advanced emergency blanket on the market - meticulously designed never to fail when you're counting on it with your life. It all starts with the material - vacuum-metalized polyethylene reflects 90% of your body heat while also offering a number of other important features that set it apart from traditional mylar blankets: it opens easily and will not shred if nicked or punctured, rips and tears can be repaired, it is quiet and won't crinkle in high winds, and its high-visibility orange exterior makes it easy for rescuers to find you. Sized to fit one person.



Weight: 2.5oz
Size: 56" x 84"

name: SOL Emergency 2 Person Blanket
description:
The most advanced emergency blanket on the market - meticulously designed never to fail when you're counting on it with your life. It all starts with the material - vacuum-metalized polyethylene reflects 90% of your body heat while also offering a number of other important features that set it apart from traditional mylar blankets: it opens easily and will not shred if nicked or punctured, rips and tears can be repaired, it is quiet and won't crinkle in high winds, and its high-visibility orange exterior makes it easy for rescuers to find you. Sized to fit two people.

Weight: 3.5 oz
Size: 60" x 96"

name: SOL Emergency Bivvy
description:
The ultralight, ultra-warm full protection shelter! The SOL Emergency Bivvy is made from the same heat-reflective polyethylene as AMK's world-famous emergency blankets (reflecting 90% of your body heat back to you), with the added benefit of being fully sealed so that no wind, rain, or snow can get inside. If you're forced to spend the unexpected night outdoors, hop in the SOL Emergency Bivvy as soon as the temperature drops and instantly improve the odds in your favor.



Weight: 3.8oz
Size: 36" x 84"

name: Stormproof Match Kit
description:
The UCO Stormproof Match Kit is a waterproof case that includes 25 matches and 3 strikers. The case features an integrated striker on the outside to provide an easy location for lighting matches and can hold up to 40 matches. The ribbed case is easy to grip with cold hands. Unlike other “waterproof” or “windproof” matches, UCO Stormproof Matches are easy to light, and will stay lit for up to 15 seconds, even after being submerged in water! Being able to reliably make a fire is vital for cooking, generating warmth, and in survival situations, making signal fires. UCO Stormproof Matches are perfect for camping, emergency kits, and should be part of every 10 Essentials check list.

FEATURES
Durable, waterproof case floats and keeps contents dry and protected.
Molded, vertical ribbing provides a sure grip in wet, harsh conditions.
External, integrated, and replaceable striker for easy lighting.
Includes 25 windproof and waterproof matches and 3 strikers. Match case can hold up to 40 matches.
Matches are easy to light and will relight after being submerged in water!
Up to 15 second burn time.
Extended length of match allows for added safety to keep from burning fingertips.
Lights campfires, stoves, gas-barbecues, etc.
Match case is US patent pending.
Weight (Kit): 1.7 oz. (48 g)

name: Snaplight Glow Stick
description: Providing 360ø of light, the 6" SnapLight is recommended for personal use during evacuations, power outages, camping, auto safety, and utility work. Perfect for survival, first aid, and evacuation kits as they produce no heat, sparks, or flame.

name: Swedish Firesteel Mini
description:
Originally developed for the Swedish Department of Defense, Swedish FireSteel® fire starter is a flash of genius. Its 3,000°C (5400°F) spark makes fire building easy in any weather, at any altitude. Used by a number of armies around the world, Swedish FireSteel's dependability has already made it a favorite of survival experts, hunters, fishermen, and campers. It has also found its way into cabins and backyards as a foolproof way to light stoves and gas barbecues.

FEATURES
Durable—lasts approximately 1,500 strikes.
Stainless steel striker.
Produces a 3,000°C (5,400°F) spark and works when wet.
Extremely compact and lightweight.
Lights campfires, stoves, gas-barbecues, etc.
Bright spark—can be used as emergency signal.
Compatible with Leave No Trace ethics.
Weight: 0.5 oz. (14 g)

name: Swedish Firesteel Scout
description:
Originally developed for the Swedish Department of Defense, Swedish FireSteel® fire starter is a flash of genius. Its 3,000°C (5400°F) spark makes fire building easy in any weather, at any altitude. Used by a number of armies around the world, Swedish FireSteel's dependability has already made it a favorite of survival experts, hunters, fishermen, and campers. It has also found its way into cabins and backyards as a foolproof way to light stoves and gas barbecues.

FEATURES
Durable—lasts approximately 3,000 strikes.
Stainless steel striker.
Produces a 3,000°C (5,400°F) spark and works when wet.
Compact and lightweight.
Lights campfires, stoves, gas-barbecues, etc.
Bright spark—can be used as emergency signal.
Compatible with Leave No Trace ethics.
Weight: 1.1 oz. (31 g)

name: Clarius LED Lantern
description:
The UCO Clarus LED Lantern is an even smaller version of our already compact-sized Lumora LED Lantern. The collapsible lantern switches easily to flashlight mode and is easy to transport. Don't be fooled by its small size as it provides up to 150 lumens of diffused white light in lantern mode. And as the need arises, the on/off button switches from mid to bright to dim-levels of light or a strobe for emergency situations. Perfect for auto, home, and boat emergency preparedness kits, RVs, and in your backpack.


FEATURES
Collapsible lantern is rugged, water resistant, and easy to transport.
Frosted globe slides up for lantern mode and down for flashlight mode.
Bright XP-E R3 CREE LED provides a diffused white light, in lantern mode, up to 150 lumens.
Durable, plastic base with on/off button.
Burns up to 70 hours.
On/off button switches light levels from mid to bright to dim light to conserve batteries or strobe for emergeny situations.
Includes a hook for hanging.
Battery Type (not included): Three 1.5V AAA alkaline
Battery Life—up to: 70 hours
Beam Projection: 164 feet (50 m)
Bulb Type: Super bright XP-E R3 CREE LED
Highly water resistant: IPX 6
Dimensions—open: 6.5″ high x 2″ diameter (16.5 cm x 5.1 cm)
Dimensions—closed: 4.5″ high x 2″ diameter (11.4 cm x 5.1 cm)
Weight (w/ batteries): 4.0 oz. (112 g)
Warning: Do not look directly into the LED light.

name: Lumora LED Lantern
description:
The UCO Lumora LED Lantern is a compact and collapsible lantern that provides up to 180 lumens of light that is comfortable to read by. The Lumora's frosted globe slides down easily to switch between lantern and flashlight modes when you need more focused lighting. The Lumora can also be attached to any tripod, walking stick, or other device with a 1/4-20 mounting screw. The on/off switch controls the brightness of the lantern—just hold the button and it will dim or brighten, then it flashes twice when it has reached the lowest/highest setting. Perfect for auto and home emergency preparedness kits, RVs, and around the campsite.


FEATURES
Durable base with extendable feet for additional stability.
Collapsible lantern is rugged, water resistant, and easy to transport.
Bright R3 XP-G CREE LED provides a diffused white light, in lantern mode, up to 180 lumens.
Frosted globe slides up and down easily to allow use as lantern or flashlight.
Dimming switch controls on/off and switching from bright to low light to conserve batteries.
Attaches to any device with a 1/4-20 mounting screw.
Includes a dual hook for hanging.
Battery Type (not included): Four 1.5V AA alkaline
Battery Life—up to: 190 hours on low
Bulb Type: Super bright R3 XP-G CREE LED
Highly water resistant: IPX 6
Beam Projection: 250 ft. (75 m)
Dimensions—open: 8.0″ high x 2.5″ diameter (20.5 cm x 6.5 cm)
Dimensions—closed: 5.5″ high x 2.5″ diameter (14 cm x 6.5 cm)
Weight (w/ batteries): 8.0 oz. (228 g)
Warning: Do not look directly into the LED light.

name: Rescue Signal Mirror
description: Signaling is a major key in being rescued.  This is a durable polycarbonate mirror with mil-spec retro-reflective aiming aid for one-handed use.  The flash is visible for over 20 miles.

name: Lifeline Trail Light Day Hiker
description:
3.7oz first aid kit perfect for camping, backpacking or hiking that can treat 3 people on a 1 day trip.

CARRY CASE
1	DURABLE RIP-STOP BAG
FIRST AID

Total Pieces: 57

name: Lifeline Trail light 3
description:
This 10oz well stocked first aid kit contains enough supplies to treat 3 people up to 3 days while camping, backpacking or hiking.

CARRY CASE
1	DURABLE RIP-STOP BAG
FIRST AID
1	FIRST AID BOOKLET
1	TWEEZERS
1	PAIR VINYL GLOVES
3	SAFETY PIN
5	COTTON TIPPED APPLICATOR

1	LIP BALM
2	ALCOHOL PREP PAD

2	STING RELIEF PAD

3	TRIPLE ANTIBIOTIC OINTMENT
1	TINCTURE OF BENZOIN SWAB
1	SPF 30 SUNSCREEN
2	ACETAMINOPHEN PACKET
2	IBUPROFEN PACKET
4	ANTIHISTAMINE TABLET
5	3/8” X 1-1/2” BANDAGE
10	3/4” X 3” BANDAGE
2	KNUCKLE BANDAGE
1	KNEE/ELBOW BANDAGE
5	WOUND CLOSURE STRIP
2	2” X 2” STERILE GAUZE PAD

1	5” X 9” COMBINE DRESSING
2	3” X 4” NON-ADHERENT DRESSING
1	2” CONFORMING GAUZE ROLL
1	2” ELASTIC BANDAGE
1	1” ADHESIVE TAPE ROLL
Total Pieces: 72

name: Nalgene HDPE Ultra lite 32oz
description: Made from HDPE (high-density polyethylene) these bottles are very lightweight and durable making them great for backpacking. Wide mouth opening (63 mm) makes them easy to fill with ice or clean.

name: Nalgene Wide-Mouth 1 Qt
description:
Nalgene's classic 32 oz wide-mouth water bottle made in tough, translucent Tritan copolyester. 
BPA free
Dishwasher safe and won't retain odors
Leak proof
Tough and impact resistant

name: Nalgene Silo 48 oz
description: When you need greater capacity the Silo is the ticket. Guaranteed leak proof. Easily slides into standard packs and backpack side pockets. Durable. Standard 63mm Loop-Top cap. Neck configuration works with most major water purifiers and filters.

name: Samson Stacker
description: A large quantity of water is important.   Have you thought how you would move it on the go?  Our Samson Stackers are the perfect answer.  They are made to stack one upon the other and being rectangular in shape they make efficient use of space.  Ours come with a tamper evident lid at no extra cost.  They are made with high density polyethylene and are FDA approved.

name: Water Spigot
description: This is a must for our samson stacker.  It makes pouring easy and convenient.  We suggest owning one and rotating the lids.  But we will sell you more if you want.

name: 250 Super Tanker
description: Excellent way to store a lot of water.  This tank is narrow enough to fit through doorways and stores water high and safely.  Great use of space.  Please call for shipping prices and availability.

name: Water Barrel
description: 20, 30 and 55-gallon water barrel provides enough water for drinking, cooking, and sanitation.  Includes one fine and one coarse bung nut closures.  Made from Heavy-duty, thick, high molecular weight polyethylene FDA approved resin and BPA free.

name: Siphon Pump
description: Got water in barrels? Here is how to get it out.

name: Aquamira Water Purifier Tablets
description:
Lightweight but powerful, Aquamira Water Purifier Tablets provide all the benefits of our popular Water Treatment Drops in an easy to use solid format. Each tablet purifies one liter (32oz.) of water and is conveniently sealed in an individual child resistant foil pouch. The individual tablet pouches are stored inside our re-sealable storage pouch that eliminates packaging waste and can be packed away almost anywhere. To use, simply drop one tablet into one liter of water and wait the required time.
EPA Registered Purifier, Aquamira Water Purifier Tablets contain a patented chlorine dioxide formula that produces a powerful germicidal agent when released in water. When used as directed, Aquamira Water Purifier Tablets meet the EPA guidelines for Microbiological Water Purifiers making it the safest solution on the market. Great for weekend hiking, camping, hunting, or fishing trips. The 12 pack is perfect for 72 hour emergency kits. Aquamira Water Purifier Tablets will not discolor water and will actually improve the taste of treated water.
Also available in 24 Tablet Packs.

name: Aquamira Frontier
description:
The Frontier Emergency Water Filter System is ideal for hiking, travel, and emergency preparedness. It is the perfect addition to your 72 hour emergency kit. One unit will filter up to 20 gallons (75L) of water. The Frontier Filter is tested and certified to remove >99.9% of Cryptosporidium and Giardia. The Frontier Emergency Water Filter System is also easy to operate, just attach and expand the straw, submerge the filter end into the water source, and drink through the straw.
Ultra light and compact, the Aquamira Frontier Emergency Filter System weighs less than one ounce and easily slips into a day pack, shirt pocket or travel luggage and is always ready when you need it. The Frontier Filter is the ideal alternative to heavy, bulky and expensive pump filtration units when space and weight are primary factors. Activated coconut shell carbon helps reduce waterborne chemicals, improves water taste and eliminates odors. Use the Frontier Emergency Water Filter System to drink from any bottle, cup or directly from water sources.

name: POTABLE AQUA PLUS
description: A revolutionary two stage process that makes water bacteriologically safe to drink and taste good. After treating water with Potable Aqua, simply drop 1-2 tablets of the neutralizer into the water and wait 3-5 minutes for clear, great tasting water. It greatly reduces the iodine taste and the discoloration caused by the iodine. Packaged in a 50 count bottle along with a 50 count bottle of Potable Aqua on a blister card. Treats up to 50 quarts. REMINDER: Use Potable Aqua first to make the water safe to drink. The neutralizer will not eliminate harmful bacteria or viruses.

name: Aquamira Water Treatment Drops
description:
The First Choice of serious outdoorsmen, Aquamira Water Treatment Drops treats drinking water using chlorine dioxide. Our chlorine dioxide formula has consistently proven to be effective in clear, muddy, warm and cold water. Small size, portability and long shelf life allows this highly effective treatment method to be easily carried and used by individuals anywhere in the world. Each kit contains everything you need to treat up to 30 gallons of water.
EPA Registered Water Treatment, Aquamira Water Treatment Drops are proven safe and effective. Great for hiking, camping, hunting, fishing, boating, white water, RV’s, travel, home water storage, and emergency kits. Aquamira Water Treatment Drops will not discolor water and will actually improve the taste of treated water.

Also available in a economical 2oz bottle.

name: Aquamira Frontier Pro
description:
Like no other filter system in the world. The designers at Aquamira have come up with the ultimate pump free filter system. We told our designers that there was something missing when it came to portable filtration devices. We wanted a small, compact, easy to use, filter that would compete with the “big boys.” No pumps or tangly hoses to mess with, we just wanted the cleanest, easiest, most compact system in the world. With this in mind our designers considered multiple uses, the prevention of cross contamination, size, weight, ease of use, extended filter life, universal connectivity, as well as “hands free” gravity flow capability in the development of the Frontier Pro filter system. The result is a new concept in ultra-light, compact portable filtration that fits in the palm of your hand. Which is why we say “Dump the Pump!”
Connect to almost anything, using the universal connectivity system. The Frontier Pro filter will connect directly to any water bottle with a 28mm opening such as a Platypus® or standard spring water bottle. Using the tube connection feature you can connect to the drink tube of your hydration system, or drink from any open container or water source. Since you drink directly from the unit there is no chance of confusing inlet and outlet tubes resulting in possible cross contamination. The Frontier Pro can also be set up in a Cap Strap™ keeps the drinking end clean and contamination free.

name: Aquamira Filtered Water Bottle
description:
So Much More than just Great Tasting Water! The New Aquamira® Water Filter Bottle provides a lightweight, easy-to-use supply of safe drinking water.  Aquamira CR Filtration TechnologyTM not only removes chlorine, bad tastes and odors, but it also removes over 99.9% of Cryptosporidium and Giardia; the two leading causes of waterborne illnesses. 
Designed for Ease of Use: The newly designed Aquamira Water Bottle is ergonomically shaped to fit comfortably in your hand, in standard cup holders, or bicycle cages.  The additional "Finger-Grip" carry loop allows you to carry the bottle with one finger, or secure it to backpacks.  Constructed of BPA free LDPE plastic, the Aquamira water bottle is easy to squeeze, when higher flow rates are desired.  The patented BITE-METM valve provides high flow rates, leak-free shut-off and will not pinch your tongue. 
New! "No-Tip-To-Drink" Design: The new 100 gallon capacity Aquamira Filter Capsule boasts several improvements over the "Drop-In" filter design.  The capsule is easy to install, ultrasonically sealed, and interfaces directly with the BITE-ME valve, making a seal between the cap and filter unnecessary.  Venting is independent of the filter, eliminating any chance of cross contamination.  Since the filter draws from the bottom of the bottle, there is no need to tip the bottle to drink.  Just bite and squeeze to enjoy fresh filtered water anytime.

name: Steripen Emergency
description:
You can consistently rely on the SteriPEN Emergency water purifier to provide you with access to safe drinking water in a time of crisis.

Affordable and efficient, the SteriPEN Emergency purifies 200 half-liter servings of water on just one set of AA lithium batteries, enough to see your family comfortably through any problem time. TheSteriPEN Emergeny UV lamp life is 3,000 treatments.

The SteriPEN Emergency is designed to fit perfectly into commercial water bottles, forming a seal that lets you keep the water in the original bottle for purification. Just insert the SteriPEN Emergency securely into the mouth of the bottle, turn it upside down, and you have safe drinking water in less than a minute.

SteriPEN Emergency is powered by 4 AA batteries. Battery quality varies greatly by brand. We recommend using only well-known brand name Lithium or Nickel Metal Hydride batteries. Alkaline batteries  are not recommended.

name: Hiker Microfilter
description: The outdoor market's best selling microfilter. Compact design and easy operation. Microfiltration method: AntiClog technology: 129 square inches of pleated 0.3 micron glass fiber media. Output: Up to 1 qt./minute (48 strokes/minute). Cartridge capacity: Depends on water quality. Weight: 11 oz. Height: 6.5". Hose length: 36". Includes: Prefilter, universal bottle adapter and carry bag.

name: Katadyn Vario
description: Combines the two best technologies - ceramic and pleated microfiltration. A simple turn engages a ceramic prefilter for longer life in dirty water or a pleated glassfiber filter in normal conditions. Dual piston technology provides maximum output with minimum effort. Ultra fast flow (2 liters/minute), carbon core with replaceable carbon so water always tastes fresh. Adaptor base attaches directly to water bottles or output hose can be used to fill hydration systems or larger containers. Cartridge capacity: Up to 530 gal. (106 gal. for carbon), Size: 7.5" x 4", Wt: 15 oz.

name: Swedish Fire knife
description:
A colorful outdoor knife with Swedish FireSteel® fire starter. The Swedish FireKnife is a collaboration between Light My Fire and Mora of Sweden, and we could hardly have picked a better partner. Mora has made top-notch knives for 120 years.

But this is more than just an extremely sharp, flexible and sturdy all-around knife: the handle contains a fire starter. In other words, you can gut and clean a fish, split kindling and light a campfire with one single handy tool

name: Survive Necker
description:
Preordered blades are shipping as we get them finished. Blades ordered on the site now will be built and shipped out as soon as the preorders are completed.

Blade Material: Bohler M-390
Blade Length: 2"
Blade Cutting Length: 1.94"
Total Knife Height: 1.31"
Blade Thickness: 5/32"(.156")
Overall Length: 4"
Weight: (Knife Only) 1.2oz. (W/Sheath) 2.5oz.
A bit about the steel used in this SURVIVE! Knife:
Kydex Sheath is included, please choose your desired color.

For our smaller knives, we offer an exceptionally high grade of stainless steel. Choose our Bohler M-390 blade steel for a very corrosion resistant, all weather knife, with superior edge holding.

name: Survive gso 4.1
description:
These will be in soon!  Near the middle of November.  Order and reserve yours today!!
Blade Material: CPM-3V 
Blade Length: 4.25" (tip to front of handle)
Blade Cutting Length: 4.33"
Blade Height: 1.25"
Blade Thickness: 5/32"(.156")
Overall Length: 8.95"
A bit about the steel used in SURVIVE! Knives:
Sheath is included with knife, please choose your color.  

CPM-3V is a high alloyed tool steel, made using the Crucible Particle Metallurgy process, that has a very high impact toughness and excellent edge holding. Being made with the CPM process, this steel is also very resistant to lateral stress (flex) breakage, making it a perfect choice for a high performance, hard use knife.

name: Hawke Harrier Elite Desert or Black
description:
This one is a looker! The Blackstone finish found on all metal components of this knife contrast extraordinarily well with the coyote tan color or Black G-10 composite handle scales. I love this knife.  Love it all day long.
	
• AUS-8 Stainless Steel Blade 
• Blackstone Coating
• Flipout® finger guard
• G-10 Handle Scales	
• Lanyard Hole
• 3 3/4” Blade
• 8” Overall

name: Hawke Kestrel
description:
Somewhere along the way, Hawke adopted a design for a blade edge that later became his signature techno re-curve. Essentially the design is a modern version of a recurved blade. Mykel's preference is to trap the object within the confines of the blade, then by grinding at an angle rather than a curve we're able to accomplish the same task a different, perhaps more refined way.

	
• 8CR13 MOV Steel 
• Full Tang Construction
• G-10 Handle Scales
• Kydex Sheath with Chain	
• 3" Tanto Blad
• 5 1/2” Overall

name: Hawke Peregrine Special Edition
description:
Hawke's signature fixed blade piece, with the additional convenience of 1.5" of serrations at the base of the blade. These aggressive jimps will add a ton of materials to your list of "cuttables." Not to mention the fact that they do wonders for the look of the knife, very mean!

SPECIAL LIMITED ICEKON COATED EDITION, available while quantities last! 

	
• AUS-8 Stainless Steel Blade 
• Full Tang Construction
• Blackstone Protective Finish
• Multiple Lanyard Attachment Points
• Injected	Molded Rubber Handle
• Multiple Lanyard Attachment Points	
• 5" Tanto Blade
• 10 1/2” Overall

name: Hawke Peregrine Serrated
description:
Hawke's signature fixed blade piece, with the additional convenience of 1.5" of serrations at the base of the blade. These aggressive jimps will add a ton of materials to your list of "cuttables." Not to mention the fact that they do wonders for the look of the knife, very mean! 

	
• AUS-8 Stainless Steel Blade 
• Full Tang Construction
• Blackstone Protective Finish
• Multiple Lanyard Attachment Points
• Injected	Molded Rubber Handle
• Multiple Lanyard Attachment Points	
• 5" Tanto Blade
• 10 1/2” Overall

name: Hawke Peregrine
description:
Hawke's signature fixed blade piece. He's most concerned with "grippability" and blade shape with this model. His proprietary Blackstone coating is used and a soft silicon rubber handle gives the user confidence in slippery situations. Finally, the knife's sheath is (at Hawke's demand) very heavy duty. It can be configured in many ways, and has been constructed of high tensile strength nylon.

	
• AUS-8 Stainless Steel Blade 
• Full Tang Construction
• Blackstone Protective Finish
• Multiple Lanyard Attachment Points
• Injected	Molded Rubber Handle
• Multiple Lanyard Attachment Points	
• 5" Tanto Blade
• 10 1/2” Overall

name: Harrier Hawke Blackstone
description:
"This amazing coloration was developed by a knife genius and master craftsman and artist, JW...It hit exactly all the things I asked of him:
1) Something that worked for tactical guys but not jet black, as often that stands out.
2) Something that worked for cops and citizens as a tactical and practical look and image.
3) Something that looked classic, industrial, used and broken in straight out of the box.
In short, this blackstone look is unique, distinguished & frankly, it rocks!" 
~ Mykel Hawke

 	
• AUS-8 Stainless Steel Blade 
• Thumbstud
• Flipout® finger guard
• G-10 Handle Scales
• Lanyard Hole
• 5 1/4” Blade
• 6 1/4” Closed

name: Harrier Hawke Serrated
description:
The serrated model offers the same great features and benefits of the "Harrier Hawke" but with one great additional feature: partial serrations. Some knife enthusiasts swear by these strategically placed cut-outs near the base of the sharpened edge. Serrations allow the knife to be useful in exponentially more situations, especially outdoors and survival. Cutting limbs for shelter or cutting rope for trapping and rigging are just a couple of extra uses where the Harriers excel.

 
• AUS-8 Stainless Steel Blade 
• Thumbstud
• Flipout ® finger guard
• G-10 Handle Scales	
• Lanyard Hole
• 5 1/4” Blade
• 6 1/4” Closed

name: Harrier Hawke
description:
The Harrier Hawke was inspired by Hawke's first charge toward the knife business. Mykel first used his expertise to help create his critically acclaimed "Hawke Hellion" for TOPS knives. It was this positive experience that prompted Mykel to begin thinking of new designs for differing applications. The Harrier, though very large, is still considered a pocket knife design. It's a folder that carries with it one very unique feature: flip-out finger guards. These guards, though reminiscent of safety mechanisms used on swords for centuries, are an all-original take on an age-old invention. These guards are strategically placed near the pivot point of the knife and are able to be rotated upward and outward a full 90 degrees so that they may act as a safety stop for the user's potentially fatigued hands. This design is patented by Mykel himself...so don't expect to see this innovation anywhere else.

	
• AUS-8 Stainless Steel Blade 
• Thumbstud
• Flipout® finger guard
• G-10 Handle Scales	
• Lanyard Hole
• 5 1/4” Blade
• 6 1/4” Closed
